RestPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It's essential that you're prepared to
encounter a monster at any time.<sp:0:4:0>You can do that by staying well-rested,
staying <clr:0000>stocked-up on food<clr:ffff>, and making
sure your <clr:0000>weapons are combat-ready<clr:ffff>.
These little preparations can make all the
difference when you're in harm's way.
StartPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Fighting isn't just about physical strength
and skill. It's also about <clr:0000>knowing more<clr:ffff>
than your opponent.
That's why I read the <clr:0000>newspaper<clr:ffff>. You
never know what you might need to
know someday.
GoalPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I heard there's a big picture drawn on the
ground up <clr:0000>north<clr:ffff>. A <clr:0000>geoglyph<clr:ffff>—<sp:5:0:0>that's what
they call it.
But you know what else they've got up
in those snowfields? No roads and no
places to hide!
Plus, I hear there's a huge <clr:0000>monster <clr:ffff>with
<clr:0000>three heads<clr:ffff>... <sp:5:1:0>Yeesh!

<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'll go someday, but I think I better bulk
up a little first.
GoRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Oh yeah, I've got some info to share!<sp:0:4:0>Have you seen those monsters with one
large eye? They'll <clr:0000>chase after any enemy
they catch sight of<clr:ffff>.
If only we could use their <clr:0000>eyeballs as
weapons<clr:ffff>. Seems like the other eyeballs
I plucked from enemies are good for that.
GoRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You know, some <clr:0000>monsters <clr:ffff>just set up a
<clr:0000>large base <clr:ffff>nearby.<sp:0:4:0>Ever since I heard about that, I've been
dreaming about going in there and taking
'em all out!
<sp:3:0:2:0301>But if I tried that today, I think I'd be
dead before I reached the entrance.

<sp:3:0:2:0700>So, I gotta train up and learn combat
strategies, like how to assess enemies'
moves and time my attacks!
When I'm done with all that, I'll be those
monsters' worst nightmare!
Near_GoalPoint_01: I want to see a geoglyph!
talk00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_01>Hey, you're <sp:5:0:0>the guy from that time with
the All-Clucking Cucco! <sp:5:1:0>Thanks for getting
all that sorted out.
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Since then, I've been traveling all over,
trying to get strong enough to decide my
own path through life.
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Maybe running into each other is a sign
I'm doing things right!<sp:5:0:0> I'm going to be just
as strong as you someday, I swear it.
Greeting:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice>Oh...<sp:5:0:0> You're the guy from that time with
the All-Clucking Cucco. Glad to see you
looking well.
I'm here in Hebra to get stronger.
Training in cold weather is the best way
to bulk up my muscles—<sp:5:0:0>and my spirit!
StartPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Fighting monsters takes strength and
skill, yes, but also <clr:0000>knowledge<clr:ffff>. That's why
I read the <clr:0000>newspaper <clr:ffff>every day.
<sp:3:0:2:0801>You never know. <sp:5:0:0>A trivial-seeming scrap
of information might just be what saves
your skin!
GoRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>They say that monsters with one large eye
will <clr:0000>chase down any enemy they catch in
their sights<clr:ffff>.
One day, I'll be strong enough to try <clr:0000>using
one of those big eyes as a weapon<clr:ffff>!
GoRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Good fighting's all about strategy. You
gotta watch your opponents' moves, and
time your attacks!
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think_00>At least, that's what I've heard...
I'm not even strong enough to take
a Bokoblin.
Let alone all the monsters in that
stronghold near here...

<sp:3:0:2:0700>But! No point getting down in the dumps
about it. I've got training to do!
GoalPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I heard there's a big picture drawn on the
ground up <clr:0000>north<clr:ffff>. A <clr:0000>geoglyph<clr:ffff>—<sp:5:0:0>that's what
they call it.
But you know what else they've got up
north? No roads and a huge <clr:0000>monster<clr:ffff>
with <clr:0000>three heads<clr:ffff>!
So I'm conflicted. If that thing found me,
I'm not sure how long I'd last.
RestPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I consider rest to be a key part of combat.
I mean it!<sp:0:4:0>It's a chance to think about the battle
ahead. How strong are your enemies?
What terrain will you be fighting on?
Most importantly, <clr:0000>what food will you bring<clr:ffff>
and <clr:0000>how will you prepare your weapons<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0>If you don't rest, you'll never get to ask
yourself these essential questions!
BackRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Be careful exploring the caves around
here. Sometimes they have monsters
camped out inside.
I learned that the hard way. Once I
walked into a cave, only to be greeted
by a full-blown Bokoblin ambush.<sp:0:4:0>Not recommended!
BackRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Be careful. There's a cave nearby that's
absolutely packed with monsters.
BackRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>A stationary snowball, that's one thing.
But a <clr:0000>snowball <clr:ffff>with momentum? Deadly!

If you're not careful, a <clr:0000>flying monster<clr:ffff>
might <clr:0000>rain one down <clr:ffff>on you before you
can dodge out of the way.
So be vigilant, OK? Eyes up!
BackRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Watch out for <clr:0000>snowballs <clr:ffff>out here. Deadly!
I'm not kidding!

You get hit by one rolling down a hill?
Lights out!

A <clr:0000>monster <clr:ffff>flying overhead <clr:0000>pelts you
with one<clr:ffff>? Sweet dreams, sword boy!

<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Or, in the fleeting chance you survive...<sp:5:0:0>
you'll be too embarrassed to tell anyone
what happened.
